Description_lang: Shields a target, absorbing damage for $316847D. While present the target is immune to Crowd Control and is unable to be slowed to below $316847s3% of normal speed.If the shield is broken before the duration expires, all damage done to the shield is inflicted to the target. Additionally, this triggers $@spellname313322.
AuraDescription_lang: Absorbs $316847w1 damage.Immune to Crowd Control effects.Unable to be slowed below $316847s3% of normal speed.
